name: FairyTaleFeud
0:
”Alexa, open Fairy Tale Feud”
”What are the rules?”
”Wizard”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fairy tale feud
des:
Fairy Tale Feud is an easy to play kid-friendly game with fun contests between fairy tale creatures.

The Evil Witch is trying to take over the Enchanted Forest and only you can help the good fairy tale creatures. You'll take part in series of contests to determine the fate of the Enchanted Forest. If you get 5 good creatures into the Forest before the Witch you will beat her! 

On each turn you will select who to send into the forest, the rules are simple:
- Giants always defeat Elves since they are so much bigger and stronger.
- Wizards always beat Giants by using magic on them.
- Elves will always defeat a Wizard by tricking him. 

You may also be joined by special characters from time to time! 

The game is enhanced with images on devices with displays. Good luck, the fate of the Enchanted Forest is in your hands!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
